verses.text: \w Oh|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* head \w were|strong="H5971"\w* waters, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* eyes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spring \w of|strong="H4057"\w* tears, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H5971"\w* weep day \w and|strong="H3212"\w* night \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* slain \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*!

Oh \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* wilderness \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lodging \w place|strong="H7198"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* wayfaring \w men|strong="H7451"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w* \w leave|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* adulterers, \w an|strong="H3588"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H7451"\w*.

“\w They|strong="H3588"\w* bend \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongue, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* bow, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* falsehood. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* grown strong \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* truth; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w proceed|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w to|strong="H1980"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* don’t know \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,” says \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

“Everyone beware \w of|strong="H3956"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* don’t trust \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w*; \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H2048"\w* \w brother|strong="H7453"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* utterly supplant, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H2048"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* go around \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* slanderer.

\w Friends|strong="H3045"\w* deceive each other, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* speak \w the|strong="H5002"\w* truth. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w to|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w lies|strong="H4820"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* weary \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w* committing iniquity.

\w Your|strong="H3068"\w* habitation \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* middle \w of|strong="H3068"\w* deceit. \w Through|strong="H5971"\w* deceit, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* know \w me|strong="H6440"\w*,” \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

Therefore \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* Armies \w says|strong="H1696"\w*, “Behold, \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* melt \w them|strong="H7760"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* test \w them|strong="H7760"\w*; \w for|strong="H7130"\w* \w how|strong="H7965"\w* should \w I|strong="H7760"\w* deal \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w*?

\w Their|strong="H3068"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w deadly|strong="H5315"\w* arrow. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w speaks|strong="H5002"\w* deceit. \w One|strong="H2088"\w* \w speaks|strong="H5002"\w* peaceably \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbor \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H5315"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* waits \w to|strong="H3068"\w* ambush \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

Shouldn’t \w I|strong="H3588"\w* punish \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w these|strong="H8085"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*?” says \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. “Shouldn’t \w my|strong="H8085"\w* soul \w be|strong="H3808"\w* avenged \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nation \w such|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w*?

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* weep \w and|strong="H3063"\w* wail \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mountains, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* lament \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* pastures \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness, \w because|strong="H1097"\w* \w they|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* burned \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H1097"\w* \w one|strong="H1097"\w* passes \w through|strong="H5892"\w*; Men can’t hear \w the|strong="H5414"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* livestock. Both \w the|strong="H5414"\w* birds \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* sky \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* animals \w have|strong="H3063"\w* fled. \w They|strong="H3389"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* gone.

“\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* Jerusalem heaps, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dwelling place \w of|strong="H3068"\w* jackals. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* cities \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah \w a|strong="H3068"\w* desolation, \w without|strong="H1097"\w* inhabitant.”

\w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* wise enough \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H5414"\w*? \w Who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H8085"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*? \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* perished \w and|strong="H1980"\w* burned \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w passes|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* says, “Because \w they|strong="H3820"\w* have forsaken \w my|strong="H3925"\w* law which \w I|strong="H3212"\w* set before \w them|strong="H3925"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* have \w not|strong="H3212"\w* obeyed \w my|strong="H3925"\w* voice or \w walked|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H3925"\w* ways,

\w but|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* walked after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* stubbornness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3478"\w* after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* Baals, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers taught \w them|strong="H8248"\w*.”

\w Therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* \w Armies|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3615"\w* Israel, says, “\w Behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w feed|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w*, \w with|strong="H3045"\w* wormwood \w and|strong="H7971"\w* give \w them|strong="H1992"\w* poisoned water \w to|strong="H5704"\w* drink.

\w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* scatter \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* among \w the|strong="H3541"\w* nations, \w whom|strong="H7121"\w* neither \w they|strong="H3068"\w* nor \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H3068"\w* known. \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* sword \w after|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*, \w until|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* consumed \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.”

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* Armies says, “\w Consider|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* call \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* mourning women, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*. Send \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* skillful women, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H4325"\w* \w come|strong="H3381"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H7993"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* haste \w and|strong="H6963"\w* take \w up|strong="H4908"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* eyes \w may|strong="H8085"\w* run \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H6726"\w* tears \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* eyelids gush \w out|strong="H7993"\w* \w with|strong="H6726"\w* waters.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w wailing|strong="H5092"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w out|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zion, ‘\w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* ruined! \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* greatly confounded \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H8085"\w* land, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* dwellings.’”

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* hear \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*’s word, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* women. Let \w your|strong="H3588"\w* ear receive \w the|strong="H3588"\w* word \w of|strong="H2351"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mouth. Teach \w your|strong="H3588"\w* daughters wailing. Everyone teach \w her|strong="H3772"\w* neighbor \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lamentation.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w death|strong="H5038"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* windows. \w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* entered \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* palaces \w to|strong="H1696"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* children \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w outside|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* young men \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* streets.

Speak, “\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*, “‘\w The|strong="H3541"\w* dead bodies \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* fall \w as|strong="H3068"\w* dung \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* open field, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* handful after \w the|strong="H3541"\w* harvester. No \w one|strong="H1368"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* gather \w them|strong="H3068"\w*.’”

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H5002"\w*, “Don’t let \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H7919"\w*. Don’t let \w the|strong="H5002"\w* mighty \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3068"\w*. Don’t let \w the|strong="H5002"\w* rich \w man|strong="H3045"\w* \w glory|strong="H1984"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* riches.

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w let|strong="H6485"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* glories glory \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* understanding, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* knows \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* exercises loving kindness, justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* righteousness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*,” \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*.

“Behold, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w come|strong="H3478"\w*,” says \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* punish \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* circumcised \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* flesh:

Egypt, Judah, Edom, the children of Ammon, Moab, and all who have the corners of their hair cut off, who dwell in the wilderness, for all the nations are uncircumcised, and all the house of Israel are uncircumcised in heart.”
